title: Ducati font
content:
Ducati has been using this font lately to name their bikes. Anybody have any idea what it is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture11.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421234948/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture11.jpg) | 33.95 KB |
author: Helveticus

comments.content:
It looks like [BN Elements](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421234948/http:/www.dafont.com/bn-elements.font?nb_ppp=50&psize=s&text=SPERBIKE4) that has been widened.

It seems like 80% of Techno fonts are freebies. Sheesh!

- Mike Yanega
